summary: Original music addon by composer Gianmarco Leone
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE:
New version uploaded (1.2)! Volume correction and smaller size.
Endorse if it works, otherwise leave a comment! Thank you :)

Gianmarco
-----------------


Orchestral music album which enhance Skyrim music world. None of the tracks replace an existing track: they just expand Skyrim musical palette.
All tracks are original and composed by Gianmarco Leone - www.gianmarcoleone.com


Complete tracklist:
1- Dawn of Hope [exploration]
2- Enchanted Forest [exploration]
3- The Coming of Spring [town]
4- Following the Master [exploration]
5- The Betrayal [dungeon]
6- Escape from the Ambush [combat]
7- The Hidden Path [dungeon]
8- A Peaceful Clearing [town]
9- The Kingdom from Here [exploration]
10- Time of Revenge [combat]

You can listen to the tracks here:Â https://soundcloud.com/gianmarco-leone/sets/dark-rpg-music-set

INSTRUCTIONS:

Simply extract the zip in the Data folder under your Skyrim installation directory
author: Gianmarco Leone
